com.exortions.pluginutils.item

Class ItemBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.exortions.pluginutils.item.ItemBuilder

  • public class ItemBuilder
extends Object
    ItemBuilder utility class. All constructors will unless specified in constructor directly: Default material to Material.DIRT, Default amount to 1 Default name to material's default name Default damage value to default damage value
    Since:
    0.3.10.13
    Author:
    Exortions

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ItemBuilder()
      Default item builder constructor.
      ItemBuilder(org.bukkit.Material material)
      Constructor that only takes in the material
      ItemBuilder(String name)
      Another constructor, takes in the name for the item.
      ItemBuilder(String name, int amount)
      Another constructor, only takes in name and amount.
      ItemBuilder(String name, org.bukkit.Material material)
      Constructor that only takes in the name and material.
      ItemBuilder(String name, org.bukkit.Material material, int amount)
      Constructor that takes in the name, material and amount.
      ItemBuilder(String name, org.bukkit.Material material, int amount, short damage)
      Constructor that takes in the name, material, amount, and damage value.
      ItemBuilder(String name, org.bukkit.Material material, short dmg)
      Constructor that takes in the name, material and damage value.
